full_summary:
### Tender Notice
#### Title
Enclosed Cargo Trailer
#### Description
The Department of National Defence is requesting a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-19TRLR to acquire two (2) Enclosed Cargo Trailers and related items. The supply arrangement is open only to suppliers who hold a pre-qualified status under the RFSA.
#### Key Requirements
* Quantity: Two (2) Enclosed Cargo Trailers and related items
* Configuration: Configuration 4
* Delivery Date: On or before 120 days ARO
* Security Requirements: N/A
#### Background
The DND requires Enclosed Cargo Trailers and related items to meet its operational needs. Responsive suppliers must have a pre-qualified status under the RFSA E60HP-19TRLR.
#### How to Respond
Potential suppliers may express interest by responding to this notice. Suppliers must meet the requirements of the RFSA to be considered for the award. The contract documents may be submitted in either English or French.
#### Important Deadlines
* Tender Closes: 
  * 2022-12-07 (14:00:00)
* Documents Submission: On or before the tender closing date
#### Contracting Authority
The contracting authority is Victor Shepstone of the DND. Suppliers may contact him through the email victor.shepstone@forces.gc.ca or the phone 819-939-3040.

#### Restrictions
This solicitation is only open to suppliers with a pre-qualified status under the RFSA E60HP-19TRLR. Suppliers may refer to the link https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HP-923-76996 to become a pre-qualified supplier. This tender is open to suppliers worldwide. Canada is the country of delivery.
#### Language
The contract documents may be submitted in English or French. The Tender Notice Label flavour functionality will be applied to the solicitation. This is a competitive - selective tendering process.
